transcoder.h File Reference

Classes

class  Transcoder
 Simple transcoder for converting between external char and wchar_t strings and internal strings. More...

Namespaces

namespace  log4cxx
namespace  log4cxx::helpers
 

We need to double some logic from LOG4CXX_PTR_DEF or else we are unable to override the comparison operator, which we need to properly fix LOGCXX-394.
